4j4cpzlt8mlx0yv422lus.content:
Welcome to my Flashcards app!

This is a small project that I created for myself to learn new stuffs and to sharpen my TypeScript, Vue3, NestJS and GitHub Actions skills.

Please don't add or delete any cards as this is my personal knowledge repository. If you do manage to add or delete any cards please reach out to me and tell me how you did it so I can improve security in this app.

Cheers!
